title: About the Time When I Lied to My Tsundere Childhood Friend That “I Got a Girlfriend” - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cold Love Interests   Cute Story   Early Romance   Heartwarming   Jealousy   Male Protagonist   Short Story   Tsundere
author: Hachi   はち
description:
I have a childhood friend who is a tsundere. I don’t know how she came to be a tsundere, but she’s only tsundere for me.

I love her so much.

I love her because she’s so cute when she’s a dere.

I’ve been wondering what would happen if I told my tsundere childhood friend that I had a girlfriend.>
